scripts.release: VERSION=$(jq -r '.version' package.json) && if curl -s https://crates.io/api/v1/crates/takumi/versions | jq -e ".versions[] | select(.num == \"$VERSION\")" > /dev/null; then echo "Version $VERSION already exists on crates.io. Skipping publish."; else echo "Version $VERSION not found. Proceeding with publish..."; cargo publish; fi
